org.webcurator.core.notification
Class Mailable

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.core.notification.Mailable

public class Mailable
extends java.lang.Object

The Mailable object holds all the attributes of a Mailable message. It is designed for use with the MailServer to send email messages. The Mailable object does not contain mail attachments.

Author:
bprice
